name: urbandictionary-alexa
description: An Amazon Alexa skill for defining terms on Urban Dictionary

scripts.export: rm -rf tmp && mkdir tmp && cp -r node_modules/* tmp && cp index.js tmp && cd tmp && zip -r urbandictionary.zip * && mv urbandictionary.zip ../exports/ && cd ../exports && node -e "require('../tmp/index').schema()" > urbandictionary-schema.json && node -e "require('../tmp/index').utterances()" > urbandictionary-utterances.txt && rm -rf ../tmp

author: Max McLennan
